title: [Large-scale] Narrative-Based Science Problem-Solving Game Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts (middle school level) and experience using simple digital tools
context.additional_context: Learners experience solving science problems through game mechanics while studying instructional design principles applicable to real classroom settings.

learning_goals: Learners can design science problem-solving scenarios using adventure game design principles.
Learners can explain at least three strategies to enhance engagement during narrative-based problem-solving processes.
Learners can develop a prototype for educational content design that considers multimodal environments (text/image/sound).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
